title: Charm Of Charm
desc:
Post 1410
- When someone plays a card that effects you, they have a 1/8 chance for that card to become **Charmed.**
**Charmed:** A status that effect cards. If a card is charmed, the name will be turned into **Kiss,** the color <:colorless:1106434944261177374>, and the effect will make the targeted player discard a card.
